::Grimlock::
   
  Grimlock: Right. Grimlock say need Stormblaze.
   
  Grimlock starts running off in T-Rex mode and eventualy reaches the shore line of Atlantis where he realizes he is on an island.
   
  Grimlock: How me Grimlock get to Olympus?
   
  Grimlock heads for the nearest transport hanger in the city. When he finds it he opens a comm.
   
  Grimlock: Me Grimlock, Dinobot, need transport for special mission. What say you?
   
  Grimlock pounds on the hanger door with his clawed hand.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
          Jotunn turned to Grimlock.

Jotunn: We need a lot of raw power... Go to Olympus... Find
Motherload. Tell her we need Stormblaze. She'll understand...

He passed out, and the troopers quickly took him inside the transport
to secure him to a medic post.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Kup/Elder::
> 
> Kup finds a boat and gets in, starting the motor. Elder is quick
to follow. The boat zips off towards the island.
> 
> OOC: If I posted for Kup already finding the boat in m lasp post
then make this an amendment.
> 
> Kup reports back to Perseus over the commlink.
> 
> Kup: Kup here. Rodimus is down. He has aparently lost to Cyclonus.
I'm heading towards the island with Lord Elder of The Watchers. He
came from Relay.
> 
> Elder cuts in on the channel.
> 
> Elder: Lord Perseus, I fear that Cyclonus has extracted the power
of the Matrix of Leadership from Rodimus.
> 
> ::Grimlock::
> 
> Grimlock was at his Dragon Corps. commanders side.
> 
> Grimlock: What Jotunn need Grimlock to do?
> 
> Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
> OOC: Jotunn isn't in a state of mind where he is thinking
logically.
> Right at that moment, he doesn't give much knowing if his troop can or
> can't reach the Minions.
> 
> BIC: 
> 
> The missiles hit Jotunn and sent him skidding a long distance away.
> His frustration was now as palpable as the various shrapnels and tears
> in his armor.
> 
> Jotunn: Urgh... Beast... Mode...
> 
> He reverted to his massive beast mode, He would normally have been a
> terror, but was now terrible to look at.
> 
> Dragon Trooper: Commander, we could not hurt them. They're too far
> gone, probably headed away... We, uh... We lost this battle.
> 
> Jotunn gave an angry and pained groan. He stumbled as he advanced
> towards the trooper.
> 
> Jotunn: You don't have the guts... Coward! Just admit it! All of you!
> This battle was nothing! We have lost this world! Now that they have
> the Matrix, we are Unicron's slagging apetizer!
> 
> He fell flat on his chest, sparks sizzling in the missile wounds.
> 
> Jotunn: Get me out of here... We regroup and rebuild. Grimlock... I
> have a special assignment for you...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@> wrote:
> >
> > 
> > --- Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:
> > 
> > > Jotunn: No... All this... It's not right! They're leaving! They have
> > > what they came here to get! Slag you, Rodimus! Your honor has doomed
> > > us all! DRAGON CORPS! CHANGE OF ORDERS! ENGAGE AND DESTROY ALL
> > > MINIONS
> > > RIGHT AWAY! THIS IS A PRIORITY OBJECTIVE! WE STOP THEM FROM LEAVING,
> > > OR, BY THE MATRIX, WE DIE TRYING!
> > > 
> > > He bore down his gatling gun on Cyclonus and let loose in a blind
> > > frenzy. Never in his life had he feared losing control as he did
> > > then.
> > 
> > OOC: I am honestly unsure how many of the Dragon Corp there are, nor
> > thier speed capabilities. Also I can only assume that since no one
> > responded before when I was verifying positions, everyone save for
> > Cyclonus, Scourge, Rodimus, Remus, and the sweeps was still at
Atlantis
> > during the battle??? Which would mean that all would have some
distance
> > to make up before they would catch up with Cyc. 
> > 
> > Also I am having to assume that Cyclonus and crew are being shot at
> > BEFORE they fade from visual range, but they are moving fast. Cyc is
> > not going to hang around. So please consider my responses an amending
> > of my last post.
> > 
> > 
> > BIC:
> > 
> > In the air, the fading from view but not quite gone Cyclonus is moving
> > swiftly through the air. His body is digesting the new power it has
> > recieved and is enjoying it. Power flows through his circuits as his
> > own systems merge with the now corrupted power of the matrix. His form
> > seems to radiate a new power, his fusion powered engines thrusting him
> > foward at amazing speeds. He knew he would be able to hold this new
> > power, his instructions from Unicron had said as much, but the sheer
> > power was almost intoxicating. Internally he smiled.
> > 
> > It was then that bullets from a gatling gun caught up with him,
lightly
> > scored his armor and then fell behind as the Cyclonus whipped foward!
> > It was not that the guns lacked power, but simply the speed that these
> > ships were flying and the distance they were away, by the time the
> > bullets caught up they were as pebbles striking titanium shields. 
> > 
> > Howerever Cyclonus did have a response as twin missiles errupted from
> > beneath his wings. For a moment the missiles seemed to hover 
> > as they changed direction orienting on thier target. Then they burst
> > into explosive movement, glowing with encapselated power. Rather then
> > missiles with flame behind them as Cyclonus' missiles looked before,
> > they were now like twin suns as they fairly irradiated power and
> > destruction as they moved toward the source of the bullets: 
> > 
> > As the missiles streak passed, the sweeps fall in behind Cyclonus and
> > Scourge, forming a protective shield as they pick up speed.
> > 
> > For the moment Remus is ignored as the Unicronians moved foward,
> > picking up speed!
> > 
> > Preston
> > (Da'minion)
> > 
> > 
> > 
> __________________________________________________________
